|    :--     |   :--     |   :--     |  :--   |  :--   |         :--       |
| OPEN **(MERGEABLE)** | [Merging dev-feature-3 branch into dev](https://github.com/McTeaCup/TravelGenie/pull/15) | 3 days | [Frontend] [Backend]  | McTeaCup | `dev-feature-3` -> `dev`
| OPEN **(MERGEABLE)** | [unit test completed](https://github.com/McTeaCup/TravelGenie/pull/11) | 9 days | [feature] [Backend]  | McTeaCup | `Tensae-Feature-Branch` -> `dev-feature-3`
| OPEN **(CONFLICTING)** | [Dependency injection Amandment ](https://github.com/McTeaCup/TravelGenie/pull/9) | 9 days |  | McTeaCup | `Tensae-Feature-Branch` -> `main`

---
## Issues Details

### [OPEN] [CSS Styling](https://github.com/McTeaCup/TravelGenie/issues/13)
**Created:** `2024-05-06` *[Open for 4 days,]*

```
Hemsidan saknar styling och layout. 
```

**Author:** Skyeeer

**Milestone:** None

**Labels:** [feature] [Frontend] 

**Assigned:** 

---

### [OPEN] [Resultatsida](https://github.com/McTeaCup/TravelGenie/issues/12)
**Created:** `2024-05-02` *[Open for 8 days,]*

```
Skapa 2 resultatsidor. Manuell resultat och AI resultat. Skissen p책 resultatsidorna finns p책 figma.
```

**Author:** Skyeeer

**Milestone:** None

**Labels:** [feature] [Frontend] 

**Assigned:** 

---

### [OPEN] [Write user/developer documentation for frontend](https://github.com/McTeaCup/TravelGenie/issues/7)
**Created:** `2024-04-29` *[Open for 11 days]*

```
We need documentation for frontend in order to keep everything consistent and make sure we follow the same structure when it comes to code.

This documentation should be short and concise, preferably written in markdown but can also be a link to a google docs file or similar.
```

**Author:** McTeaCup

**Milestone:** None

**Labels:** [documentation] [Frontend] 

**Assigned:** 

---

### [OPEN] [Write user/developer documentation for backend](https://github.com/McTeaCup/TravelGenie/issues/6)
**Created:** `2024-04-29` *[Open for 11 days]*

```
We need a short summery of how the server and backend work in order to make sure everyone can have at least a vague idea of how it works.

This documentation should be short and concise, preferably written in markdown but can also be a link to a google docs file or similar.
```

**Author:** McTeaCup

**Milestone:** None

**Labels:** [documentation] [Backend] 

**Assigned:** 

---

### [OPEN] [Create a serverhosted solution](https://github.com/McTeaCup/TravelGenie/issues/5)
**Created:** `2024-04-29` *[Open for 11 days]*

```
We want to be able to host TravelGenie on a remote machine instead of running it locally. We need to be able to host this on a Virtual Machine on Azure so that we can access the service wherever and whenever.

This will also allow us to show off the application at it's latest stable version that is working.
```

**Author:** McTeaCup

**Milestone:** None

**Labels:** [DevOps] [Backend] 

**Assigned:** 

---

### [OPEN] [Create a workflow for auto creates PR into main branch](https://github.com/McTeaCup/TravelGenie/issues/4)
**Created:** `2024-04-29` *[Open for 11 days]*

```
Create a workflow that generates a pull request that creates a merge from  [dev-branch](https://github.com/McTeaCup/TravelGenie/tree/dev) to [main-branch](https://github.com/McTeaCup/TravelGenie/tree/main) each week to have a latest-deployable version.

This pull request will only be a request and has to be authorized by a user to merge in case of merge conflicts.

What the workflow will do is the following:
- See if there has been any new updates merged into the dev branch
- See if the two branches can be merged without problems
- Create the PR and wait for confirmation from authorized developer
```

**Author:** McTeaCup

**Milestone:** None

**Labels:** [DevOps] [workflow] 

**Assigned:** McTeaCup 

---

### [OPEN] [Merge frontend repo with current repo](https://github.com/McTeaCup/TravelGenie/issues/3)
**Created:** `2024-04-27` *[Open for 13 days]*

```
Earlier frontend and backend has been working in seperate repositories and now have to be merged together. This need to be fixed as soon as possible in order to get things going with the project and allow us to continuously develop the platform.

The current repository is cloned from Tensae's repository so most backend-stuff should already exist, but we need to make sure that everything is working properly, otherwise can't continue with our project.

Lukas has shared [this repository](https://github.com/andersonandreas/ChasChallengeGrp5/tree/DevFront) containing the collective frontend changes that should be merged.

I would like to meet with both the frontend and backend team when merging this to make sure everyone's code is added properly.
```

**Author:** McTeaCup

**Milestone:** Sprint 3 (May 6th - May 13th)

**Labels:** [high prio] [DevOps] [Frontend] [Backend] 

**Assigned:** McTeaCup 

---

### [OPEN] [Create a workflow that summaries repo state](https://github.com/McTeaCup/TravelGenie/issues/2)
**Created:** `2024-04-25` *[Open for 15 days]*

```
Create a workflow that can send a mail or create a text file that consists of the current state of the repository and how things are currently going. It should return the following:

- Current issues
- Current PRs (both opened and closed for the sprint/milestone)
- Current progress of the milestone
- How many branches that are currently open and unmerged

Comment on this issue if there is anything else we could need for the sprint planning/retro.
```

**Author:** McTeaCup

**Milestone:** Sprint 3 (May 6th - May 13th)

**Labels:** [DevOps] [workflow] 

**Assigned:** McTeaCup 

---

## Pull Requests Details

### [OPEN] [Merging dev-feature-3 branch into dev](https://github.com/McTeaCup/TravelGenie/pull/15)
**Created:** `2024-05-07` *[Open for 3 days,]*

```
This PR will be the final version of the latest stable merge of backend and frontend.

From this point forward, when creating a new feature/fix only use the branch "dev"

closes #3 
```

`dev-feature-3` --> `dev` ***(MERGEABLE)***

**Author:** McTeaCup

**Milestone:** None

**Labels:** [Frontend] [Backend] 

**Assigned:** 

---

### [OPEN] [unit test completed](https://github.com/McTeaCup/TravelGenie/pull/11)
**Created:** `2024-05-01` *[Open for 9 days,]*

```
unit test case created and tested
```

`Tensae-Feature-Branch` --> `dev-feature-3` ***(MERGEABLE)***

**Author:** ETW-BANK

**Milestone:** None

**Labels:** [feature] [Backend] 

**Assigned:** 

---

### [OPEN] [Dependency injection Amandment ](https://github.com/McTeaCup/TravelGenie/pull/9)
**Created:** `2024-05-01` *[Open for 9 days,]*

```

```

`Tensae-Feature-Branch` --> `main` ***(CONFLICTING)***

**Author:** ETW-BANK

**Milestone:** None

**Labels:** 

**Assigned:** 

---
